entry.title: Le Morte d'Arthur: Destiny Calls
entry.summary:
Author: elfinnemrys

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,883Chapters: 31/32Kudos: 74

Summary: Merlin has been wandering for centuries. Waiting for the exact, unknown time that Arthur shall rise again.He becomes a lady of King Henry VIII.He meets Robin Hood and they share a fondness that once reminded him of a certain Prince.He bumps into Matthew Hopkins, the Witchfinder General, more times than he would like, dying a different death each time.But he always comes back.He falls in love and, in turn, becomes a father, a grandfather, and a lonely old man still waiting, waiting, waiting.But this is Matty's story - Merlin's granddaughter. And the ghost of Arthur follows her everywhere.This fic is completed, so don't worry about me not updating it. All in due time :)

entry.title: How to Tame a Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: MerlinsBrokenHeart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,254Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 3

Summary: When Arthur Pendragon is sent by his father to buy out the struggling Gaius Zoo and Wildlife Sanctuary, he expects a simple business deal. Instead, he’s drawn into a web of secrets, betrayal, and magic. Merlin Ambrose, the zoo’s fiercely loyal zoologist, refuses to let the sanctuary fall into Uther Pendragon’s hands, and Arthur soon learns the true cost of his family’s legacy. As Arthur uncovers the truth about his mother’s death, his sister Morgana’s captivity, and the dark experiments carried out by his father, he must choose between loyalty and justice. With the help of Merlin and Morgana, Arthur fights to save the zoo, protect those he loves, and bring Uther to justice. Along the way, Arthur and Merlin’s relationship evolves from adversaries to partners—and ultimately, to lovers—proving that found family and courage can overcome even the darkest of legacies. Expect magic, animal chaos, emotional healing, and a dramatic showdown that changes everything and brings Uther to his knees.

entry.title: ...How to be not straight (for very good reasons)
entry.summary:
Author: SueRose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,780Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Rich nepo boy Arthur Pendragon joins his university's queer club. And pretends to be queer, because he needs to write a paper about queer representation. But.... He has not expected this. This being the leader of the club, namely Merlins Emrys, who does not believe a word he says. Will he be able to appear queer enough to his new peers? Or will all.of this end up in a giant disaster?

entry.title: The Price of Magic
entry.summary:
Author: Belle_Lestrange101

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 88,746Chapters: 20/35Kudos: 147

Summary: Unsatisfied with his current life, Merlin takes a sabbatical from work and explores the British coastline to clear his head of life's mundaneness. On his return from Cornwall, he comes across a young blonde girl attempting to hitch-hike along the motorway. Fearing for her safety, Merlin offers her a ride home.Upon entering the small town of Cam-Lott, Merlin makes a lasting impression on Police Chief Arthur Pendranyl and starts a chain of events that have him seeing the inside of a jail cell more often than not. When he isn't being an errand-boy or stumbling upon strange trinkets in forest caves, Merlin slots into the small town life with ease. Between summer faire's, camping trips and hiking, Merlin almost forgets that no one in the town -except one -has left the towns perimeter.Why has no one left? Why are his memories feeling hazier by the day? And why, oh why, is there a sword buried in a stone?[Rating will change in later chapters]

entry.title: The Trial of Uther Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: HerMajestyofLichtenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,845Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 1,367

Summary: When Morgana invokes a long forgotten spell, the ancient and powerful Court of Magic is summoned to pass judgment on Uther Pendragon and his bloodline for their crimes against the magical world. But for the verdict to be carried out, every seat on the Council must be filled, and the chair of the Dragonlords has long stood empty. Now Merlin faces an impossible choice: side with his people and end Uther’s reign of terror, or save Arthur.

entry.title: I'd Burn the World (to bring some heat to you)
entry.summary:
Author: JackiIDK912

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,101Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: “The boy has bewitched you, Arthur. Lord only knows for how long,” Uther decreed. Saying so aloud made it true. That was how Camelot worked. “His name is Merlin!” Arthur roared, his feet spurring him closer to the king without his mind’s consent. “If you are planning on executing him, at least have the guts to speak his name!” Or: Uther executes a sorcerer and Arthur loses his mind

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 180,329Chapters: 56/62Kudos: 1,651

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: The Prince & The Pauper
entry.summary:
Author: plotcole (Quint_Essentially)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,985Chapters: 14/26Kudos: 34

Summary: Extract from ‘Knights of the Temples: The Prince Arthur Story’ by T. H. Blanc, published 2021: 'There we have it. Violence, intrigue, danger, romance, and self-sacrifice. In a couple of short months, Captain Arthur Pendragon, eldest son of The Most Honourable The Marquess of Camelot, Lord Uther Pendragon, almost singlehandedly dismantled one of the most covert and sinister arms of the Axis Powers’ military forces, ensuring that its leader and the secret weapons she had designed would never again see the light of day. ' OR: The story of a young nobleman who couldn't stand by when his country needed him, and his loyal companion who would follow Arthur to the very ends of the Earth if he had to.

entry.title: The Marriage Council
entry.summary:
Author: Asterope03

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,776Chapters: 23/23Kudos: 121

Summary: “And lastly,” the servant continued, “the castle prepares to welcome ten esteemed princesses from noble houses across the realm, who will arrive at Camelot next week to be received by His Royal Highness Prince Arthur, as part of courtship proceedings arranged by His Majesty.”Arthur blinked. Then straightened. “…What?” he said, sharply enough to make half the court flinch. or It's time Arthur marries, which forces Arthur to confront ignored feelings towards a certain servant (I imagine the story being after the last battle, so almost everything is canon, but Morgana was never evil, everyone is alive, even Uther, and magic doesn't exist. But I consider every interaction between Arthur and Merlin in the series to have happened, except the death part of course)

entry.title: If I told you myself
entry.summary:
Author: riverray

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,229Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 615

Summary: Merlin can’t remember the last time he’s locked his bedroom door, if ever. But he chooses not to think about it. He merely sulks his way back to his bed, taking a moment to contemplate taking off his trousers and tunic from the night before. He decides not to think about that either.Instead, he decides not to think at all. He just falls back into his bed, covers up his body more so in shame than for warmth, and closes his eyes. Basically Merlin is sexually assaulted and this story follows how he and everyone else deals with it.Spoiler alert: THEY DON'T HANDLE IT WELL.

entry.title: How to Heal a Dragon
entry.summary:
Author: Once_and_future_tavern

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,550Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 116

entry.title: Uther's Trick
entry.summary:
Author: Meowmix21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,673Chapters: 44/?Kudos: 1,217

Summary: A life for a life was the deal for Arthur's birth, what does Uther do when he finds out that the deal was a bit more specific than he thought? Why find the loophole of course! If someone born from magic can't have a child normally... well you just have to find magic that can... or in this case, magic himself!From mood swings, to weddings, to assassins, to love potions and so much more, Merlin's pregnancy isn't going to be smooth sailing for anyone, especially not for Merlin.

entry.title: A New Position
entry.summary:
Author: Fye_R

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,105Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: It was then that Merlin realised he had yet again frozen rather than turning back around as he had intended. Arthur shot him a look that Merlin couldn’t begin to decode. The whole situation was just utterly bizarre. The thought crossed his mind that perhaps Arthur and Gwen were enchanted, but he dismissed it just as easily. The situation was strange, but neither of the pair seemed to be acting out of character beyond their request for him to serve them in this way. Maybe it was a royalty thing. Maybe this was normal for kings and queens. Maybe it was a particular kind of insanity reserved only for Pendragons.
